    • draw_

      protected void draw_​(processing.core.PGraphics app)
      Description copied from class: GraphicObject
      Declare the method that subclasses must implement. When this method is called, we are already in the reference frame of the object, so the implementation of this method should not invoke translate/rotate
      Specified by:
      draw_ in class GraphicObject
      Parameters:
      app - The Processing application in which the action takes place

      Description copied from class: GraphicObject

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
